CustomField.formula: IF (YTD_kWh_Production__c - Opportunity__r.Product__r.Annual_kWh_Maximum__c > 0, 'OVER ANNUAL kWH CAP', IF (YTD_kWh_Production__c/Opportunity__r.Product__r.Annual_kWh_Maximum__c > 0.90, '90%-100% of Annual kWh Cap', IF (YTD_kWh_Production__c/Opportunity__r.Product__r.Annual_kWh_Maximum__c > 0.80, '80% - 90% of Annual kWh Cap','No Warning')))
CustomField.label: Flag: Nearing Annual kWH Cap
